statement.text: A target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 602 could be met within 3 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay down $104 of your total revolving/open account balances of $889 every month for 3 months.
Pay all your bills on time for 3 months.
Stay current on your payments so that your most recent delinquency ages to 7 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 6 years, 3 months.
Do not apply for any new credit.
